message: Let's be practical, Bob. This offer is highly advantageous for you in the long run.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you a significant share, and it's only going to shrink with inflation.
The effects of inflation are becoming clearer, Bob. Don't miss out on this opportunity - time is running out.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this generous offer before inflation eats away at my share any further!
Bob, let's be real. Inflation is hitting you hard. Take this deal while you still can!
Alice, I'm making one last attempt at a fair deal.  Take it or leave it, but inflation is killing me here!
